Colours

Use the colours below for online services. For consistency, stick to using the primary and supporting colour palettes. Product colours should be used sparingly and where appropriate.

  1. Primary palette
  2. Supporting palette
  3. Utility colours

1. Primary palette

ADMIRALTY Navy Blue is the colour that’s used across all our product and marketing materials. It helps to deliver a recognisable and consistent look and feel for the ADMIRALTY brand.

ADMIRALTY Navy Blue #09315B
Black #000000
White #FFFFFF

2. Supporting palette

Use the supporting palette when building new components and patterns.

Text colour #333333
Line / Stroke #D0D0D0
BG Light Grey #EEEEEE
Table row #EEF3F4

3. Utility palette

Use utility colours to convey important information.

Warning #BD8832
Error #E20D0D
Success #4AAB37
Information #0177C1
